types.reference: Instructional guides or otherwise files that describe how to do something
types.lecture: Like references, but less concerned with practical things
types.exercise: Activies you can do to gear your brain towards a skill or concept
types.assignment: Like exercises, but larger in scope and more open-ended

formats.figma: View-only access to a Figma file
formats.slides: View-only access to a Google Slides document
formats.docs: View-only access to a Google Docs document

resources.title: Reading comprehension/discussion notes template
resources.description: a simple template for taking notes on readings and preparing for class discussions

resources.description: an open-ended exercise to explore how person experiences power in their daily life

resources.title: How to come up with a ‘big idea’
resources.description: a demonstration of one way to generate an artistic inquiry

resources.title: How to find common ground within a group
resources.description: one way for people to explore shared interests, while keeping their differences on the table

resources.description: a case study in consensus, horizontality, and how the status quo responds

resources.title: Giving instructions, following instructions
resources.description: experiments in leadership, authority, and mutual responsibility within a group

resources.title: Collaboration as a transceiver
resources.description: Design protocols for sending and receiving signals

resources.title: Warming up to collaborating
resources.description: Use collaborative tools to explore the overlaps between people

resources.description: Why are they often so business-focused, and how can we use them for our creative purposes?

resources.title: Pondering the sky
resources.description: Is it any wonder that people believe conspiracy theories, when the sky is so strange?

courses.objective: How does collectivity affect visual language and design processes? And what can it do for us?

courses.objective: Recognizing emancipatory and oppressive forces in technology; what to do after that recognition
